Details: EXPERTISE: Piloting A deft handler able to Sprint further, become harder to hit, and even move after shooting thanks to Ace Pilot. Skilled in handling a 'Mech and avoiding damage through the use of Sure Footing, and better at hitting with Melee attacks. Has an increased threshold at which piloted 'Mechs become UNSTEADY. SPECIALIZATION: Guts Capable of standing their ground more effectively through Bulwark and able to suffer additional Injuries before being incapacitated. Can also better control recoil effects from weapons.
